üì¢ Update: Stylish Action HUD v1.0.1

‚ú® New Features & Improvements
*   **Layout Standardization:** Refactored layout to an anchor-based system, standardizing component positioning using pixels instead of percentages.
*   **Snap Feature:** Added window snapping for easier HUD positioning.
*   **Update Notification:** Added a new update notification system.

üêõ Bug Fixes
*   **PF2e Resource Recovery:** Fixed an issue where right-clicking resources in PF2e did not correctly recover them.
*   **Global Macro Settings:** Fixed a bug where Global Macros could not be added in the settings menu.
